item.title: Web Authentication
item.description: Notes From CyrusN Authentication in Golang with JWTs Cookies vs Tokens: The Definitive Guide The Ins and Outs of Token Based Authentication | Scotch Notes From Leesei Enterprise APIs and OAuth: Have it All Secure your users’ passwords from the browser on Authentication Protocols Basic access authentication - Wikiwand Digest access authentication - Wikiwand Secure Remote Password protocol - Wikiwand Anatomy of a zero-knowledge web application - Clipperz, register your creations on the blockchain
